Key Match Events: Andrew Wiggins scored a game-high 29 points and made a game-best five 3-pointers in the Warriors' 112-104 loss to the Los Angeles Clippers.
Stephen Curry was sidelined due to a left ankle injury sustained in the third and fourth quarters.
Buddy Hield hit a deep three-pointer while being fouled, converting a four-point play.
Kevon Looney recorded a double-double with 10 points and 11 rebounds in 20 minutes off the bench.
